title: Profane Scourge
content:
Scourge Information

Strike with subjugating fury, adding your Proficiency Bonus to the damage roll. If you hit a Fiend or Undead creature, deal an additional 2d6 Slashing damage and possibly Bane it. Undead and Constructs can't Bleed.
